desc: “We choose the best parcels of Malbec that we can get from across Australia, regardless of region, bringing them together to make The Best Lot.” The Best Lot Malbec. Buy Wine online. Australias finest multiregional Malbec. Langhorne Creek, Robe, Barossa Valley, McLaren Vale, Adelaide Hills, Australian Winery

layout.text: One Wine, Only Malbec, The Best Lot.

“We choose the best parcels of Malbec that we can get from across Australia, regardless of region, bringing them together to make The Best Lot.”

The 2019 vintage release of The Best Lot is selected entirely from a single vineyard in Langhorne Creek
